dcterms:creator: X. Qu
W. Wang
K. Lu
J. Zhou
dcterms:description: A public in-air handwritten Chinese character dataset, where each character is written in the midair within a single stroke. The dataset contains totally 431,825 samples covering 3755 Chinese characters (level-1 set of GB2312-80), where each class contains 115 different samples.
dcterms:title: IAHCC-UCAS2016

dcterms:creator: F. Yin
Q. Wang
X. Zhang
C. Liu
dcterms:description: The most popular dataset of online handwritten Chinese characters collected by the CASIA institution. For the OLHCCR task, the sub-datasets CASIA-OLHWDB 1.0 & 1.1 are used as the training set, which contains 2,693,183 samples; and the ICDAR-2013 competition sub-dataset is used as the test set, which contains 224,590 samples of 3755 character classes (level-1 set of GB2312-80).
dcterms:title: ICDAR-2013

dcterms:creator: I. Guyon
L. Schomaker
R. Plamondon
M. Liberman
S. Janet
dcterms:description: A project for on-line data exchange and recognizer benchmarks, consisting of isolated digits, upper case and lower case English letters.
dcterms:title: UNIPEN
